PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1990-26081990-12-050ISTC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry, Science and Technology of Bertrand J. Lavoie, of Montreal, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Federal Business Development Bank to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years; and designation of the said Bertrand J. Lavoie as Chairman of the Board of Directors of the Federal Business Development Bank to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
